# Advance Contract Award Notice: Accommodation Services Fall 2022 - Cologne, Germany

## Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defence is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) to provide accommodation services for Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) personnel in Cologne, Germany. The contractor is required to provide support for the provision of accommodation services for approximately 250 CAF personnel from October 27 to November 30, 2022.

## Criteria for Assessment of Statements of Capabilities

To assess the capabilities of interested suppliers, the following criteria must be met:

*   The contractor must provide rooms as outlined in the Statement of Work (SOW), Table 2.1, and as defined in the SOW, paragraphs 1.3.1 and 1.3.2.
*   The contractor must provide conference/meeting rooms as outlined in the SOW, Table 2.1.
*   The contractor must provide parking as outlined in the SOW, Table 2.1.
*   The accommodation facilities must be located within the geographical boundaries outlined in the SOW, para 2.3.8, and in Figure 2.1.

## Justification for Pre-Identified Supplier

The pre-identified supplier, Pullman Cologne, is the only supplier that can meet all the mandatory criteria listed above. No other supplier is capable of providing sufficient rooms, suites, parking, and conference rooms on the selected dates within the determined geographical region.

## Period and Estimated Value of the Contract

The proposed contract is for a period of October 27 to November 30, 2022, and the estimated value of the contract, including options, is approximately €304,319.43.

## Suppliers' Right to Submit a Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the requested services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person, Steven Myers. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements and must include an official letter from the hotel confirming the availability of rooms, parking, and conference rooms as per the SOW.

## Closing Date and Contact Information

The closing date for accepting statements of capabilities is October 21, 2022, at 11am EDT. Inquiries and statements of capabilities should be directed to Steven Myers, DSPCOS 6-5-4-2, 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, ON, 343-549-5167, steven.myers@forces.gc.ca
